so the first one um the personal data should be processed
lawfully fairly and in a transparent manner so basically for a

and also need to disclose everything to the data owners
the second principle personal data should be collect

for that purpose and the set principle are the personal

list privilege principle and first
the data should be accurate and whenever it's necessary necessary keep up to date
and fifth uh is about the period the data can be retained by the

the last principle is about what kind of mechanism

data that user data they collected
